moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Brave Bird
moves.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil.

moves.name: Bullet Seed
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
moves.shortDesc: Confuses the target.

moves.name: Defog
moves.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness. If there is a terrain active and this move is successful, the terrain will be cleared.
moves.shortDesc: -1 evasion; clears terrain and hazards on both sides.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1.

moves.name: Dual Wingbeat
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2 times in one turn.

moves.name: Endure
moves.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Facade
moves.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Feather Dance
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Grass Knot
moves.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
moves.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

moves.name: Grass Pledge
moves.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
moves.shortDesc: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

moves.name: Grassy Glide
moves.desc: If the current terrain is Grassy Terrain and the user is grounded, this move has its priority increased by 1.
moves.shortDesc: User on Grassy Terrain: +1 priority.

moves.name: Grassy Terrain
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: 5 turns. Grounded: +Grass power, +1/16 max HP.

moves.name: Growl
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Attack by 1.

moves.name: Haze
moves.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
moves.shortDesc: Eliminates all stat changes.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

moves.name: Leafage
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Leaf Blade
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Peck
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Pluck
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

moves.name: Protect
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

moves.name: Rest
moves.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
moves.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

moves.name: Roost
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
moves.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

moves.name: Seed Bomb
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, Wicked Torque, or any two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
moves.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

moves.name: Swift
moves.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 2.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 1/4 recoil.

moves.name: Tera Blast
moves.desc: If the user is Terastallized, this move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes, and this move's type becomes the same as the user's Tera Type. In addition, if the user's Tera Type is Stellar, this move has 100 power, is super effective against Terastallized targets and neutral against other targets, and lowers the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: If Terastallized: Phys. if Atk > SpA, type = Tera.

moves.name: Trailblaze
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Grass-type attack.
abilities.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Grass attacks.

abilities.name: Long Reach
abilities.desc: This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.
